For Dante, I've set my Steam controls to press the style button + one of the dpad buttons simultaneously and it's basically the best decision I've ever made.
• O = Style + Swordmaster
• L2 + O = Style + Trickster
• L2 + Square = Style + Gunslinger
• R2 = Style + Royal Guard
